name: KNIGHTS OF FANTASY
description:
From the developer of Shattered Void comes KNIGHTS OF FANTASY! A brand new Legend of Zelda like Gameboy game!

FEATURES:

Enjoy 5 fantastic minutes of puzzles, battles, and adventuring through an incredibly short dungeon with a totally heart-moving story conveyed in just three gloriously written sentences about a quest to save your brother!

And smash some pots.

CONTROLS:

Z - Interact
X - Attack
Arrows - Move
Escape - Return to main menu/quit

(Made in Gamemaker over the course of GBJAM 5)
